Articles.Content:
Here is the challenge, you have to plant a flag at every Ksc structure (on top of the structure) you can use any vehicle to land on them (I used a plane)

Rules are:

1-No Parts From Mods

2-No Cheats

3-Stairs And Ladders Are Allowed, But You Can't Use Glitches

When you're done send me proof in the comment section below this text, also if you have trouble you can use this plane Here!

Edited November 27, 2016 by Program Kerbal Space

Are you meaning to include the island airport and other locations?

I ask because to plant flags at every structure at the KSC only requires a command pod so you can launch a Kerbal ... Just walk to each structure and plant a flag

19 minutes ago, DoctorDavinci said:

Are you meaning to include the island airport and other locations?

I ask because to plant flags at every structure at the KSC only requires a command pod so you can launch a Kerbal ... Just walk to each structure and plant a flag

on top of it (the roof) Also I guess i will edit the article to say that.

Edited November 27, 2016 by Program Kerbal Space
